name: Boids?
description:
Hey! This isn't a game

Let me just get that out there. This is not a game. Unless you find it exhilarating to see triangles moving mindlessly.

This is a concept-game, where you can spawn tiny triangular "boids", which swarm towards your cursor, follow their neighbours, and sometimes move randomly. You can control their biases towards such actions as well!

That is all

Thank you!
